frame.name: Locating
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Perceiver</fen> determines the <fen>Location</fen> of a <fen>Sought_entity</fen> within a <fen>Ground</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Perceiver">Kim</fex> <t>found</t> <fex name="Sought_entity">his hat</fex> <fex name="Location">on the far side</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Perceiver
FE.definition:
<def-root>The individual that determines the <fen>Location</fen> of the <fen>Sought_entity</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Perceiver">I</fex> finally <t>found</t> the peanut underneath the couch cusion.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Sought_entity
FE.definition: <def-root>The entity that the <fen>Perceiver</fen> succeeds in finding.</def-root>

FE.name: Location
FE.definition:
<def-root>The position of the <fen>Sought_entity</fen>.
<ex>I <t>found</t> him <fex name="Loc">under the bed</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Ground
FE.definition:
<def-root>The general set of entities that the <fen>Perceiver</fen> examined in order to find the <fen>Sought_entity</fen>.
<ex>Sam <t>located</t> the Imperial regal <fex name="Ground">among the coins in his pocket</fex> and passed it to the boy.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: locate.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: discover the exact place or position of.

lexUnit.name: find.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: discover by chance or deliberately.
